title: The General Motors Strike Is Over. Now Ford Is Next.
text:
The UAW membership ratified the tentative agreement struck last week with General Motors negotiators. That’s a win for the company and the workers. The union says it’s going to negotiate with Ford next.

“General Motors members have spoken,” said UAW vice president Terry Dittes in a Friday news release. “We are all so incredibly proud of UAW-GM members who captured the hearts and minds of a nation. Their sacrifice and courageous stand addressed the two-tier wages structure and permanent temporary worker classification that...
description: The UAW membership ratified the tentative agreement struck last week with General Motors negotiators. That’s a win for the company and the workers. The union says it’s going to negotiate with Ford next.
